treatment-md.title: Oobius whiteorum Triapitsyn, Petrice, Gates & Bauer, 2015, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: Two new species of Oobius Trjapitzin (Hymenoptera, Encyrtidae) egg parasitoids of Agrilus spp. (Coleoptera, Buprestidae) from the USA, including a key and taxonomic notes on other congeneric Nearctic taxa
